FuncDef: This command configures the session ID that is inserted into the packet header for all mirrored packets of the associated LI source entry.   This session ID can be used (for example by a downstream LI gateway) to identify the particular LI session to which the packet belongs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value to insert into the header of the mirrored packets. Values-1 to 4,294,967,295 (32b).

ExtraInfo: Default: no session-id (an id of 0, or no id)
